page.title: 06 SERVICES IN PEEBLES
page.content: {Services.} This area is well served by shops.The main ones are the new Fine Fare & the{Castle Warehouse.}The latter was established in 1896 & the main departments are carpets,furniture & clothing.53 full-time & 11 part-time staff.Local deliveries free,otherwise a small fee.{ Other shops}include an excellent delicatessen, a sports wear shop,shoe shops,butchers,knitware,iron mongers,gifts & bakers. {Mr van Dijk}manager of the{Hydro } states that the hotel stands in 30 acres.Outside there are tennis courts, putting green,pitch & putt, riding stables & adventure playground.Indoor facilities include squash courts,pool, jacuzzi,saunas,steam room,solariums, games room & children's playroom. Conferences contribute over 50% of {Hydro's}Â£3m.turnover. Busiest months May & Oct.
